languages.text: {n}Владайм внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Я наслышан, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}кем вы были{/d}, и что делаете с теми, кто перечит вам по недостойным поводам. Я отдам приказ расчистить проход в заслоне. Надеюсь, ваше безрассудство не приведет к гибели всей станции..."

{n}Vladaym gives you a keen look.{/n} "I know enough about {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d}, and what you do to people who oppose you without good reason. I will arrange to clear a passage in the barricade. Hopefully your rashness will not spell the death of this station..."
languages.original_text: {n}Владайм внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Я наслышан, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}кем вы были{/d}, и что делаете с теми, кто перечит вам по недостойным поводам. Я отдам приказ расчистить проход в заслоне. Надеюсь, ваше безрассудство не приведет к гибели всей станции..."

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムが鋭い視線を送る。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}以前の君{/d}と、みだりに反対する者たちへの君の対応についてはよく理解している。バリケードを通行できるよう取り計らおう。君の性急さがステーションにとって命取りにならなければ良いのだが…」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym gives you a keen look.{/n} "I know enough about {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d}, and what you do to people who oppose you without good reason. I will arrange to clear a passage in the barricade. Hopefully your rashness will not spell the death of this station..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムが鋭い視線を送る。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}以前の君{/d}と、みだりに反対する者たちへの君の対応についてはよく理解している。バリケードを通行できるよう取り計らおう。君の性急さがステーションにとって命取りにならなければ良いのだが…」

languages.text: {n}Vladaym vous lance un regard perçant.{/n} « J'en sais bien assez sur {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}votre vie d'avant{/d} et sur ce que vous faites subir à ceux qui s'opposaient à vous sans raison valable. Je vais vous faire ouvrir un passage dans la barricade, en espérant que votre témérité ne signera pas la mort de cette station... »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym gives you a keen look.{/n} "I know enough about {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d}, and what you do to people who oppose you without good reason. I will arrange to clear a passage in the barricade. Hopefully your rashness will not spell the death of this station..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym vous lance un regard perçant.{/n} « J'en sais bien assez sur votre vie d'avant et sur ce que vous faites subir à ceux qui s'opposaient à vous sans raison valable. Je vais vous faire ouvrir un passage dans la barricade, en espérant que votre témérité ne signera pas la mort de cette station... »

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆尖锐地看了你一眼。{/n}“我对{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}您曾经的所作所为{/d}了如指掌，我也知道那些胆敢反对您的人都落得了什么下场。我会命令我的手下，让他们把路障挪开，为您清理出一条道路。希望您的鲁莽不会为这座星站带来劫难……”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym gives you a keen look.{/n} "I know enough about {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d}, and what you do to people who oppose you without good reason. I will arrange to clear a passage in the barricade. Hopefully your rashness will not spell the death of this station..."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆尖锐地看了你一眼。{/n}“我对你曾经的所作所为了如指掌，我也知道那些胆敢反对你的人都落得了什么下场。我会命令我的手下，让他们把路障挪开，为你清理出一条道路。希望你的鲁莽不会成为这座星站的末日……”

languages.text: {n}Vladaym wirft dir einen scharfen Blick zu.{/n} "Ich weiß genug darüber, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}wer Ihr früher wart{/d} und was Ihr mit Leuten macht, die ohne guten Grund gegen Euch sind. Ich werde für eine Passage durch die Barrikade sorgen. Hoffentlich führt Euer übereiltes Vorgehen nicht zum Tod dieser Station ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym gives you a keen look.{/n} "I know enough about {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d}, and what you do to people who oppose you without good reason. I will arrange to clear a passage in the barricade. Hopefully your rashness will not spell the death of this station..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym wirft dir einen scharfen Blick zu.{/n} "Ich weiß genug darüber, wer Ihr früher wart und was Ihr mit Leuten macht, die ohne guten Grund gegen Euch sind. Ich werde für eine Passage durch die Barrikade sorgen. Hoffentlich führt Euer übereiltes Vorgehen nicht zum Tod dieser Station ..."

languages.text: {n}Vladaym te mira con atención.{/n} «Estoy bien informado sobre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}quién era antes{/d} y qué hace a la gente que se le opone sin una buena razón. Haré que despejen un camino en la barricada. Espero que su imprudencia no marque el fin de esta estación...».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym gives you a keen look.{/n} "I know enough about {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d}, and what you do to people who oppose you without good reason. I will arrange to clear a passage in the barricade. Hopefully your rashness will not spell the death of this station..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym te mira con atención.{/n} «Estoy bien informado sobre quién era antes y qué hace a la gente que se le opone sin una buena razón. Haré que despejen un camino en la barricada. Espero que su imprudencia no sea el fin para esta estación...».

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, sana keskin bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Önceki yaşantınızı{/d} ve size iyi bir neden sunmadan karşı çıkanlara neler yaptığınızı gayet iyi biliyorum. Barikatta geçit açtıracağım. Umarım acele giderken istasyonun ecelini getirmezsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym gives you a keen look.{/n} "I know enough about {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}who you were before{/d}, and what you do to people who oppose you without good reason. I will arrange to clear a passage in the barricade. Hopefully your rashness will not spell the death of this station..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym, sana keskin bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Önceki hayatınızı ve size iyi bir neden olmadan karşı çıkan insanlara neler yaptığınızı gayet iyi biliyorum. Barikatta bir geçit açtıracağım. Umarım acele giderken istasyonun ecelini getirmezsiniz."
